accessRightsTypeCodeType.title: Access Rights Type_ Code. Type
accessRightsTypeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of access rights.

accountingAccountNatureTypeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of accounting account nature.

accountingAccountStatusCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of accounting account status.

accountingAccountTypeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of an accounting account.

accountingAmountTypeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of accounting amount.

accountingJournalCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of an accounting journal.

accountingPerquisiteCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of an accounting perquisite.

financialAccountTypeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the type of financial account.

binaryObjectEncodingCodeType.description: A code specifying the encoding algorithm of the binary object.

mimeCodeType.title: MIME_ Code. Type
mimeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent a type of MIME.

dateOnlyFormattedDateTimeType.description: A date specific formatted point in the progression of time.

airFlowUnitMeasureType.description: The numeric value determined by a measurement of air flow.

durationUnitMeasureType.title: Duration_ Unit_ Measure. Type
durationUnitMeasureType.description: A numeric value determined by measuring a duration of time.

volumeUnitMeasureType.description: The numeric value determined by volume measuring.

weightUnitMeasureType.title: Weight_ Unit_ Measure. Type
weightUnitMeasureType.description: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

transportMovementStageCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the transport movement stage.

transportServicePaymentArrangementCodeTy.description: A character string used to represent a transport service payment arrangement.

transportServicePriorityCodeType.title: Transport Service Priority_ Code. Type
transportServicePriorityCodeType.description: A character string used to represent a transport service priority.

transportServiceRequirementCodeType.title: Transport Service Requirement_ Code. Type
transportServiceRequirementCodeType.description: A character string used to represent a transport service requirement.

validationDocumentStatusCodeType.description: A character string used to represent the document status condition of a validation document.

countrySubDivisionName.title: Birth_ Address. Country Sub-Division Name. Text
countrySubDivisionName.description: The name, expressed as text, of the sub-division of a country for this birth address.

cityName.title: Birth_ Address. City Name. Text
cityName.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this birth address.

countryId.title: Birth_ Address. Country. Identifier
countryId.description: The identifier of a country for this birth address.

cancellationStatusType.title: Cancellation_ Status. Details
cancellationStatusType.description: Information relevant to a condition of a cancellation.

conditionCode.title: Cancellation_ Status. Condition. Code
conditionCode.description: The code specifying the condition of this cancellation status.

reasonCode.title: Cancellation_ Status. Reason. Code
reasonCode.description: The code specifying the reason for this cancellation status.

reason.title: Cancellation_ Status. Reason. Text
reason.description: A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.

reasonInformation.title: Cancellation_ Status. Reason_ Information. Text
reasonInformation.description: Information, expressed as text, related to the reason for this cancellation status.

contactPersonType.title: Contact_ Person. Details
contactPersonType.description: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.

givenName.title: Contact_ Person. Given Name. Text
givenName.description: The name, expressed as text, given to this contact person, usually by parents at birth.

familyName.title: Contact_ Person. Family Name. Text
familyName.description: A name, expressed as text, that this contact person shares with members of his/her family.

birthDateTime.title: Contact_ Person. Birth. Date Time
birthDateTime.description: The date, time, date time or other date time value which specifies the birth date for this contact person.

titleCode.title: Contact_ Person. Title. Code
titleCode.description: The code specifying the title of this contact person, such as Ms., Doctor, Mister.

role.title: Contact_ Person. Role. Text
role.description: A role, expressed as text, for this contact person.

residenceCountryId.title: Contact_ Person. Residence Country. Identifier
residenceCountryId.description: The identifier of the residence country of this contact person.

specifiedBirthAddress.title: Contact_ Person. Specified. Birth_ Address
specifiedBirthAddress.description: The birth address specified for this contact person.

specifiedEmployerIdentity.title: Contact_ Person. Specified. Employer_ Identity
specifiedEmployerIdentity.description: An employer identity specified for this contact person.

specifiedPersonIdentity.title: Contact_ Person. Specified. Person_ Identity
specifiedPersonIdentity.description: The person identity specified for this contact person.

specifiedTaxRegistration.title: Contact_ Person. Specified. Tax_ Registration
specifiedTaxRegistration.description: A tax registration specified for this contact person.

creditorFinancialAccountType.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Details
creditorFinancialAccountType.description: A specific business arrangement whereby credits arising from transactions are recorded.

ibanId.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. IBAN_ Identification. Identifier
ibanId.description: The unique International Bank Account Number (IBAN) identifier for this creditor financial account.

bbanId.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. BBAN_ Identification. Identifier
bbanId.description: The unique Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN) identifier used as part of a National Account Numbering Scheme(s) for this creditor financial account.

upicId.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. UPIC_ Identification. Identifier
upicId.description: The unique Universal Payment Identification Code (UPIC) identifier used by the New York Clearing House for this creditor financial account.

typeCode.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of creditor financial account.

proprietaryType.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Proprietary_ Type. Text
proprietaryType.description: The proprietary type, expressed as text, of this creditor financial account, such as the nature or use of the creditor account.

currencyCode.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Currency. Code
currencyCode.description: The code specifying the currency of this creditor financial account (Reference ISO 4217 codes).

accountName.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Account Name. Text
accountName.description: The account name, expressed as text, of this creditor financial account.

proprietaryId.title: Creditor_ Financial Account. Proprietary_ Identification. Identifier
proprietaryId.description: The unique proprietary identifier for this creditor financial account.

creditorFinancialInstitutionType.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Details
creditorFinancialInstitutionType.description: A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.

bicId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. BIC. Identifier
bicId.description: The unique Bank Identification Code (BIC) as defined in ISO 9362 for this creditor financial institution.

chipsUniversalId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. CHIPS Universal_ Identification. Identifier
chipsUniversalId.description: The unique (United States) Clearing House Interbank Payments System (CHIPS) Universal Identification (UID) as assigned by the New York Clearing House for this creditor financial institution.

newZealandNCCId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. New Zealand NCC_ Identification. Identifier
newZealandNCCId.description: The unique New Zealand National Clearing Code (NCC) identifier as assigned by the New Zealand Bankers' Association (NZBA) for this creditor financial institution.

irishNSCId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Irish NSC_ Identification. Identifier
irishNSCId.description: The unique Irish National Sorting Code (NSC) identifier as assigned by the Irish Payments Services Organisation (IPSO) for this creditor financial institution.

ukSortCodeId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. UK Sort Code_ Identification. Identifier
ukSortCodeId.description: The unique United Kingdom (UK) Sort Code identifier as assigned by the UK Payment Association (APACS) for this creditor financial institution.

chipsParticipantId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. CHIPS Participant_ Identification. Identifier
chipsParticipantId.description: The unique (United States) Clearing House Interbank Payment System (CHIPS) Participant Identifier (ID) as assigned by the New York Clearing House for this creditor financial institution.

swissBCId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Swiss BC_ Identification. Identifier
swissBCId.description: The unique Swiss Bank Code (BC) identifier for this creditor financial institution.

fedwireRoutingNumberId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Fedwire Routing Number_ Identification. Identifier
fedwireRoutingNumberId.description: The unique Fedwire Routing Number identifier as assigned by the American Bankers Association (ABA) for this creditor financial institution.

portugueseNCCId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Portuguese NCC_ Identification. Identifier
portugueseNCCId.description: The unique Portuguese National Clearing Code (NCC) identifier for this creditor financial institution.

russianCentralBankId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Russian Central Bank_ Identification. Identifier
russianCentralBankId.description: The unique Russian Central Bank Identification Code identifier for this creditor financial institution.

italianDomesticId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Italian Domestic_ Identification. Identifier
italianDomesticId.description: The unique Italian Domestic Identification Code identifier as assigned by the Associazione Bancaria Italiana (ABI) for this creditor financial institution.

austrianBankleitzahlId.title: Creditor_ Financial Institution. Austrian Bankleitzahl_ Identification. Identifier
